text: Eni Fa'aua'a Hunkin Faleomavaega, Jr. (; August 15, 1943 â€“ February 22, 2017) was an American Samoan politician. He served as the territory's lieutenant governor and congressional delegate. He served as a U.S. House Representative from American Samoa's At-large congressional district from 1989 through 2015. Faleomavaega died at his home in Provo, Utah on February 22, 2017, aged 73. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Lieutenant Governors of American Samoa Category:United States representatives Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Eni Faleomavaega
